attributes.action: Award the George Cross to the people of Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: The people and government of the UK have demonstrated huge support for Ukraine, both financially and materially. The George Cross is a badge of honour that the people of Ukraine can rightly display with pride as a symbol of our acknowledgement of their bravery.
attributes.background: Award the George Cross to the people of Ukraine much in the same way it was awarded to the people of Malta as a recognition of their bravery and resistance against overwhelming aggression.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
